textboxes.alignment: alignment of the text, 0 for left, 1 for center, 2 for right

position: horizontal position (x) of image in percentages of the width
vertical position (y) of image in percentages of the height
images.width: width of the image in pixels
images.height: height of the image in pixels
images.src: the image stored at Binary Large Object (BLOb) format

size.width: width of the poster in pixels
size.height: height of the poster in pixels
margin: top margin in percentage of poster height
right margin in percentage of poster width
bottom margin in percentage of poster height
left margin in percentage of poster width

background.style: integer representing the background style, based on the styles available

poster.verticalAlignment: vertical alignment of the poster, 0 for top, 1 for middle, 2 for bottom
